name: BallUp Free
description:
Try to be the best with many rebounds with a ball without touching the floor!
Choose your level of difficulty by selecting the ball with which you want to play: Basketball, Football and Handball.
More you catch the ball close to the ground more you earn points.

Organize competitions between friends and try to keep the best score on the board!

Ideal for working your dexterity and your reflexes!

Have fun!

••• Game Features •••

• Full screen on the iPhone 5
• Choose your ball
• Original Music
• Select the Difficulty Level
• Develop your skill and reflexes
